body:
# **Newsletter Q4 Annual Payment + Weekly Newsletter: Final Report**


## Reference:[MoonDAO Final Report Reference](https://docs.google.com/document/d/16F-_bcC0C4889YmuQl6WWChDKQObHhmfjasDna0wOmk/edit?usp=sharing)Original Proposal: [MDP-114: Newsletter Q4 Annual Payment](https://docs.google.com/document/d/1mU9LgyFweJSqCuOwrBgZpdzO8r_GVms539vJmUHh4rE/edit?usp=sharing)

## Summary

Weekly Mooney Monday updates sent virtually every week ([see public archive](https://moondao.ck.page/profile)), except for the week of Christmas (attention is at an all-time low that week, anyway), and two Dec emails that defied the normal Mooney Monday format to focus exclusively on 1) new onboarding ease for Ticket to Space, and 2) actual Ticket to Space launch – the sweepstakes was a regular feature in weekly updates. 

ConvertKit was our #1 driver of traffic to MoonDAO.com (and subdomains) after direct traffic during past three months. Google search, Youtube, Twitter, and Instagram are our 2nd-5th, in that order. ![](https://lh7-rt.googleusercontent.com/docsz/AD_4nXdqiuvJFpuWan2X0NTfQV7cQnQHBlGNmc5ST5HL0qrS3TNtlm1pfOaVih3fo1TO4S7AZMXyFxv9jQLpt-BkR7T3_4VGOHrL9rY2h4gxMx2iqwBgIaIosMl4ukjiHkXhNy0GL1leVo6e0FVlsBzN_sPECAEx?key=yXWDpervK_8DXZ6PdAdXYQ)

We have 13,333 subscribers, so we’ve grown slightly (thanks to Sweepstakes), while going through normal churn with any newsletter.

![](https://lh7-rt.googleusercontent.com/docsz/AD_4nXeZVYVNL11pN8FfSShJztmwDI9yLsCsngubHfCJrAyq7gzFynEtRDAClaBP4DkeOKGO6M6zviKHrPGv4od5erKp3paDms31_7Pb1iOJrsqYO0unXPsRbjIrh63vAlJNaHrGnJpnOX2fv4ltVG5VSgjQ2jBk?key=yXWDpervK_8DXZ6PdAdXYQ)

![](https://lh7-rt.googleusercontent.com/docsz/AD_4nXdhvt-J5hsfE3kR5JCKCbMKB1crx04xUxKSncv52mLIbnY-58ZVDkvdMUyB1l5wBxIAEQ4S1yFNOma3eHvq9heu0JJM9FXJ9_Ht22we57zeg7ut25kevL_hdG3gIJwD6dlIClzNVoHzz_j8sX9qjvU21PV5?key=yXWDpervK_8DXZ6PdAdXYQ)

![](https://lh7-rt.googleusercontent.com/docsz/AD_4nXewGGrLJVYmJbznXubmYy6dToGAHnMcDkY5B53cqBXYmPoiNcUynaw-IsVBsqbTfIelJ4uqrdJ8vUUiMVMhi1wfhqUZr6sBQ3ow7VhYO-c-ihDCki7hAuLUvuQvynmL22MEtswf6V2TEoraA2eEiao8680?key=yXWDpervK_8DXZ6PdAdXYQ)

70% are 5-star subs meaning they’ve engaged in the past 30 days.


## Results

1. **Objective:** Weekly Mooney Monday Emails

   1. **Key Result**: Resume the weekly Mooney Monday emails again with space news, and MoonDAO updates, such as those seen on the [public MoonDAO emails page](https://moondao.ck.page/posts)

      1. **Results**: As mentioned in summary, weekly emails every week except Christmas, and two that were focused exclusively on onboarding and sweepstakes, so defied normal weekly update format

      2. **Learnings**: Nothing new vs. previous periods.

      3. **Maintenance**: Ongoing emails, but one maintenance aspect that needs to be addressed soon is a total revamp of the onboarding email sequences to reflect the new app and onboarding in preparation for the sweepstakes.

      4. **Team’s Self-Reported Score**: 0.99

      5. **Team Contributions**

**Ryan:** All the weekly emails, maintenance, automations.**Pablo:**

2. **Objective:** Monetization via SparkLoop

   1. **Key Result**: Start implementing monetization for referring subscribers to other email lists

      1. **Results**: No new steps for monetization.

      2. **Learnings**: Still same blockers of legal entity to fiat on-ramp that needs to be addressed.

      3. **Maintenance**: n/a

      4. **Team’s Self-Reported Score**: 0.0

      5. **Team Contributions**

**Ryan: n/a\
Pablo:**
